Posts.Content: Hair has just started to fall out 2 weeks after my first chemo session (taxotere). I had the cold cap so I think I'll wait a few days to see how much falls out before rushing to get my preordered wig. What do others think? Thanks Jane 20 minutes ago1
Posts.Title: Hair started to fall out

Posts.Content: Anybody have any advice on this? I get an allergic reaction to my chemo every time, on my neck and chest. However this time I now have red patches on my face too and a couple of nasty spots on my chest. I've bought Avene creams which are quite good but not particularly for the spots/boils. Thanks
Posts.Title: Red patches on face
